[[Islamic view of Ishmael|Ismail]]'s mother, [[Hagar (Bible)|Hagar]] was the handmaiden of the Princess. [[Muhammad]], a descendant of [[Islamic view of Ishmael|Ismail]] who was sent the [[Qur'an]] by [[Allah]], became the final messenger, and so the name ''Ismail'' is often taken to mean ''the
